channel.title: MySQL Integration
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
I was looking to add MySQL though vBulletin 4.2 to our RSPS (718+)
What were looking for its how, because we have no knowledge with MySQL.
What the ability we want from this, is setting Usergroups though vBulletin--) ACP (Giving Donator will be though Forum, and banning people) Promoting people will also be done though ACP.
Does anyone have an idea of this :O If anyone is interessed to help me, PM Me or add my skype: Sabrinaa.Dreamer
Thanks a Bunch,
:) ;)

item.dc:creator: @Dylan123321 Dylan123321

item.title: MySQL Integration
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

this is easy, but i don’t recommend it. vbulletin has his own encryption/hash so you cant simply import your password to the database and expect vbulletin to read it
it might be easier to manage users but if you are going to run querys all day long in your server this can slow it down by a lot

im not doing this for you, but i have read something like this on r-s. so look there or go to the how to make a highscores thread and do all that stuff for players. all you need to do then is find out how to decrypt the hash (remember its not really decrypting but thats easier to explain)

try this your self, go work on it if you make it work you have learned something
if you let someone else do this for you you don’t learn anything

Read full topic

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

There’s not many tutorials about this on the website, although if you fish around I’m sure you could find a few examples to suit your specific needs. You could take ideas out of this thread, however please note that it is not related to vBulletin or your revision, just a helping hand I guess:

programming, irc, cars
